participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and optimistic, Emily enjoys connecting with others and is always looking for the silver lining.
participant_1.background: I try to stay active and eat healthy to make myself feel younger. I listen to my favorite bands to relax when I'm not at work. My parents are not married anymore. I am a hard worker who is always looking for ways to improve myself. There are quite a few of us, but we all get along.

participant_2.name: Michael
participant_2.personality: Michael is dedicated and compassionate, with a great sense of humor that helps him cope with the stresses of his job.
participant_2.background: My favorite place to eat is at home, where I can enjoy my lasagna and not have to worry about the weather. My dog introduced me to my first and second wives. I'm almost finished with my degree. I was born in Baton Rouge. I am a doctor.

content.text: Hi! How are you?
Doing great! How about you?
I'm pretty good, thanks!
What are you up to today?
Not much, just hanging out. What about you?
Just got done with work and now I'm relaxing.
What do you do for work?
I'm a doctor, and I just finished up a long day.
Oh wow, that sounds intense.
It is, but I love it.
I'm sure you do! What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like all kinds of music, but I'm a big fan of country music.
Me too! I love country music.
What are your favorite bands?
I like Tim McGraw, Toby Keith, and Carrie Underwood.
Those are all great bands! I like them too.
Do you have any siblings?
Yes, I have two brothers and one sister.
Oh wow, that's a lot of siblings!
Yeah, it can be a lot sometimes, but we all get along really well.
That's good! I have two brothers and one sister too.
Oh, that's cool! I'm glad you all get along well.
Yeah, we do. It's a lot of fun having a big family
